citation_details.title: Dynamic functional connectivity in verbal cognitive control and word reading
citation_details.author: K Sakakura, M Brennan, M Sonoda, T Mitsuhashi
citation_details.abstract: Cognitive control processes enable the suppression of automatic behaviors and the initiation  of appropriate responses. The Stroop color naming task serves as a benchmark paradigm
citation_details.short_author: K Sakakura, M Brennan, M Sonoda, T Mitsuhashi
